summary: STARTED CAR AND BACKED OUT OF PARKING SPACE.  STEERING WHEEL WOULD HARDLY TURN  WHEELS TO THE  LEFT; NO POWER ASSIST.  STARTED MOVING FORWARD AND  TURNING RIGHT, THEN POWER ASSIST RESUMED.  ALSO, STEERING SHUDDER OCCURS AFTER ROUNDING CORNERS AND ACCELERATING.  LOCAL DEALER SERVICE REP STATES CAR NEEDS NEW RACK & PINION ASSEMBLY AND IS A COMMON PROBLEM IN CENTURIES AND REGALS 4-5 YEARS OLD.
